Translations.Text: Punyamaya tini, yamra hate rajatba. Tini sabakichura upara sarbasaktimana.
Yini srsti karechena marana o jibana, yate tomaderake pariksa karena-ke tomadera madhye karme srestha? Tini parakramasali, ksamamaya.
Tini sapta akasa stare stare srsti karechena. Tumi karunamaya allaha ta’alara srstite kona taphata dekhate pabe na. Abara drstiphera'o; kona phatala dekhate pa'o ki
atahpara tumi bara bara takiye dekha-tomara drsti byartha o parisranta haye tomara dike phire asabe.
Ami sarbanimna akasake pradipamala dbara susajjata karechi; seguloke sayatanadera jan'ye ksepanastrabat karechi ebam prastuta kare rekhechi tadera jan'ye jalanta agnira sasti.
Yara tadera palanakartake asbikara kareche tadera jan'ye rayeche jahannamera sasti. Seta kata'i na nikrsta sthana.
Yakhana tara tathaya niksipta habe, takhana tara utksipta garjana sunate pabe.
Krodhe jahannama yena phete parabe. Yakhana'i tate kona sampradaya niksipta habe takhana taderake tara sipahira jijnasa karabe. Tomadera kache ki kona satarkakari agamana kareni
tara balabeh hyam amadera kache satarkakari agamana karechila, atahpara amara mithyaropa karechilama ebam balechilamah allaha ta’ala kona kichu najila karenani. Tomara mahabibhrantite pare rayecha.
Tara ara'o balabeh yadi amara sunatama athaba bud'dhi khatatama, tabe amara jahannamabasidera madhye thakatama na.
Atahpara tara tadera aparadha sbikara karabe. Jahannamira dura hoka.
Niscaya yara tadera palanakartake na dekhe bhaya kare, tadera jan'ye rayeche ksama o mahapuraskara.
Tomara tomadera katha gopane bala athaba prakasye bala, tini to antarera bisayadi samparke samyaka abagata.
Yini srsti karechena, tini ki kare janabena na? Tini suksnajnani, samyaka jnata.
Tini tomadera jan'ye prthibike sugama karechena, ata'eba, tomara tara kamdhe bicarana kara ebam tamra deya riyika ahara kara. Tamra'i kache punarujjibana habe.
Tomara ki bhabanamukta haye gecha ye, akase yini achena tini tomaderake bhugarbhe bilina kare debena, atahpara ta kampate thakabe.
Na tomara niscinta haye gecha ye, akase yini achena, tini tomadera upara prastara brsti barsana karabena, atahpara tomara janate parabe kemana chila amara satarkabani.
Tadera purbabartira mithyaropa karechila, atahpara kata kathora hayechila amara asbikrti.
Tara ki laksya kare na, tadera mathara upara uranta paksikulera prati pakha bistarakari o pakha sankocanakari? Rahamana allaha-i taderake sthira rakhena. Tini sarba-bisaya dekhena.
Rahamana allaha ta’ala byatita tomadera kona sain'ya ache ki, ye tomaderake sahayya karabe? Kapherara bibhrantite'i patita ache.
Tini yadi riyika bandha kare dena, tabe ke ache, ye tomaderake riyika dibe baram tara abadhyata o bimukhataya dube rayeche.
Ye byakti upura haye mukhe bhara diye cale, se-i ki sat pathe cale, na se byakti ye soja haye saralapathe cale
baluna, tini'i tomaderake srsti karechena ebam diyechena karna, caksu o antara. Tomara alpa'i krtajnata prakasa kara.
Baluna, tini'i tomaderake prthibite bistrta karechena ebam tamra'i kache tomara samabeta habe.
Kapherara baleh e'i pratisruti kabe habe, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o
baluna, era jnana allaha ta’alara kache'i ache. Ami to kebala prakasya satarkakari.
Yakhana tara se'i pratisrutike asanna dekhabe takhana kapheradera mukhamandala malina haye parabe ebam bala habeh eta'i to tomara ca'ite.
Baluna, tomara ki bhebe dekhecha-yadi allaha ta’ala amake o amara sangiderake dhbansa karena athaba amadera prati daya karena, tabe kapheraderake ke yantranadayaka sasti theke raksa karabe
Baluna, tini parama karunamaya, amara tate bisbasa rakhi ebam tamra'i upara bharasa kari. Sattbara'i tomara janate parabe, ke prakasya patha-bhrastataya ache.
Baluna, tomara bhebe dekhecha ki, yadi tomadera pani bhugarbhera gabhire cale yaya, tabe ke tomaderake sarabaraha karabe panira srotadhara
nuna. Sapatha kalamera ebam se'i bisayera ya tara lipibad'dha kare
apanara palanakartara anugrahe apani um'mada nana.
Apanara jan'ye abasya'i rayeche asesa puraskara.
Apani abasya'i mahana caritrera adhikari.
Sattbara'i apani dekhe nibena ebam tara'o dekhe nibe.
Ke tomadera madhye bikaragrasta.
Apanara palanakarta samyaka janena ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini janena yara satpatha prapta.
Ata'eba, apani mithyaropakaridera anugatya karabena na.
Tara caya yadi apani namaniya hana, tabe tara'o namaniya habe.
Ye adhika sapatha kare, ye lanchita, apani tara anugatya karabena na.
Ye pascate ninda kare ekera katha aparera nikata lagiye phire.
Ye bhala kaje badha deya, se simalanghana kare, se papistha
kathora sbabhaba, tadupari kukhyata
e karane ye, se dhana-sampada o santana santatira adhikari.
Tara kache amara ayata patha kara hale se bale; sekalera upakatha.
Ami tara nasika dagiye diba.
Ami taderake pariksa karechi, yemana pariksa karechi udyana'oyaladera, yakhana tara sapatha karechila ye, sakale baganera phala aharana karabe
inasa'allaha na bale.
Atahpara apanara palanakartara paksa theke bagane eka bipada ese patita halo. Yakhana tara nidrita chila.
Phale sakala paryanta haye gela chinnabicchinna trnasama.
Sakale tara eke aparake deke balala
tomara yadi phala aharana karate ca'o, tabe sakala sakala ksete cala.
Atahpara tara calala phisaphisa kare katha balate balate
adya yena kona misakina byakti tomadera kache bagane prabesa karate na pare.
Tara sakale laphiye laphiye sajore ra'oyana hala.
Atahpara yakhana tara bagana dekhala, takhana balalah amara to patha bhule gechi.
Baram amara to kapalapora
tadera uttama byakti balalah ami ki tomaderake balini? Ekhana'o tomara allaha ta’alara pabitrata barnana karacho na kena
tara balalah amara amadera palanakartara pabitrata ghosana karachi, niscita'i amara simalanghanakari chilama.
Atahpara tara eke aparake bhatrsana karate lagala.
Tara balalah haya! Durbhoga amadera amara chilama simatikramakari.
Sambhabatah amadera palanakarta paribarte era ca'ite uttama bagana amaderake dibena. Amara amadera palanakartara kache asabadi.
Sasti ebhabe'i ase ebam parakalera sasti ara'o gurutara; yadi tara janata
mottakidera jan'ye tadera palanakartara kache rayeche neyamatera jannata.
Ami ki ajnabahaderake aparadhidera n'yaya ganya karaba
tomadera ki hala? Tomara kemana sid'dhanta diccha
tomadera ki kona kitaba ache, ya tomara patha kara.
Tate tomara ya pachanda kara, ta'i pa'o
na tomara amara kacha thekekeyamata paryanta balabat kona sapatha niyecha ye, tomara ta'i pabe ya tomara sid'dhanta karabe
apani taderake jijnasa karuna tadera ke e bisaye dayitbasila
na tadera kona sarika upasya ache? Thakale tadera sarika upasyaderake upasthita karuka yadi tara satyabadi haya.
Gocha paryanta pa kholara dinera katha smarana kara, sedina taderake sejada karate ahabana janano habe, atahpara tara saksama habe na.
Tadera drsti abanata thakabe; tara lanchanagrasta habe, athaca yakhana tara sustha o sbabhabika abasthaya chila, takhana taderake sejada karate ahabana janano hata.
Ata'eba, yara e'i kalamake mithya bale, taderake amara hate chere dina, ami emana dhire dhire taderake jahannamera dike niye yaba ye, tara janate parabe na.
Ami taderake samaya de'i. Niscaya amara kausala majabuta.
Apani ki tadera kache parisramika cana? Phale tadera upara jarimanara bojha parache
na tadera kache gayabera khabara ache? Atahpara tara ta lipibad'dha kare.
Apani apanara palanakartara adesera apeksaya sabara karuna ebam macha'oyala i'unusera mata habena na, yakhana se duhkhakula mane prarthana karechila.
Yadi tara palanakartara anugraha take samala na dita, tabe se nindita abasthaya janasun'ya prantare niksipta hata.
Atahpara tara palanakarta take manonita karalena ebam take satkarmidera antarbhukta kare nilena.
Kapherara yakhana kora'ana sune, takhana tara tadera drsti dbara yena apanake achara diye phele dibe ebam tara baleh se to ekajana pagala.
Athaca e'i kora'ana to bisbajagatera jan'ye upadesa bai naya.
Suniscita bisaya.
Suniscita bisaya ki
apani ki kichu janena, se'i suniscita bisaya ki
ada o samuda gotra mahapralayake mithya balechila.
Atahpara samuda gotrake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pralayankara biparyaya dbara.
Ebam ada gotrake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pracanda jhanjabayu
ya tini prabahita karechilena tadera upara sata ratri o ata dibasa paryanta abirama. Apani taderake dekhatena ye, tara asara kharjura kandera n'yaya bhupatita haye rayeche.
Apani tadera kona astitba dekhate pana ki
phera'una, tamra purbabartira ebam ulte ya'oya bastibasira gurutara papa karechila.
Tara tadera palanakartara rasulake aman'ya karechila. Phale tini taderake kathorahaste pakara'o karalena.
Yakhana jalocchbasa hayechila, takhana ami tomaderake calanta nauyane arohana kariyechilama.
Yate e ghatana tomadera jan'ye smrtira bisaya ebam kana etake upadesa grahanera upayogi rupe grahana kare.
Yakhana singaya phutkara deya habe-ekati matra phutkara
Ebam prthibi o parbatamala uttolita habe o curna-bicurna kare deya habe
sedina keyamata sanghatita habe.
Sedina akasa bidirna habe o biksipta habe.
Ebam pheresatagana akasera prantadese thakabe o ata jana pheresata apanara palanakartara arasake tadera urdhbe bahana karabe.
Sedina tomaderake upasthita kara habe. Tomadera kona kichu gopana thakabe na.
Atahpara yara amalanama dana hate deya habe, se balabeh na'o, tomara'o amalanama pare dekha.
Ami janatama ye, amake hisabera sam'mukhina hate habe.
Atahpara se sukhi jibana-yapana karabe
su'ucca jannate.
Tara phalasamuha abanamita thakabe.
Bigata dine tomara ya prerana karechile, tara pratidane tomara kha'o ebam pana kara trpti sahakare.
Yara amalanama tara bama hate deya habe, se balabeh haya amaya yadi amara amala nama na deya hato.
Ami yadi na janatama amara hisaba
haya, amara mrtyu'i yadi sesa hata.
Amara dhana-sampada amara kona upakare asala na.
Amara ksamata'o barabada haye gela.
Pheresataderake bala habeh dhara eke galaya beri pariye da'o
atahpara niksepa kara jahanname.
Atahpara take srnkhalita kara sattara gaja dirgha eka sikale.
Niscaya se mahana allahate bisbasi chila na.
Ebam misakinake aharya dite utsahita karata na.
Ata'eba, ajakera dina ekhane tara kona suhuda na'i.
Ebam kona khadya na'i, ksata-nihsrta pumja byatita.
Gonahagara byatita ke'u eta khabe na.
Tomara ya dekha, ami tara sapatha karachi.
Ebam ya tomara dekha na, tara
niscaya'i e'i kora'ana ekajana sam'manita rasulera anita.
Ebam eta kona kabira kalama naya; tomara kama'i bisbasa kara.
Ebam eta kona atindriyabadira katha naya; tomara kama'i anudhabana kara.
Eta bisbapalanakartara kacha theke abatirna.
Se yadi amara name kona katha racana karata
tabe ami tara daksina hasta dhare phelatama
atahpara kete ditama tara griba.
Tomadera ke'u take raksa karate parate na.
Eta khodabhirudera jan'ye abasya'i ekati upadesa.
Ami jani ye, tomadera madhye ke'u ke'u mithyaropa karabe.
Niscaya eta kapheradera jan'ye anutapera karana.
Niscaya eta niscita satya.
Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana palanakartara namera pabitrata barnana karuna.
Ekabyakti ca'ila, se'i ayaba sanghatita hoka ya abadharita
kapheradera jan'ye, yara pratirodhakari ke'u ne'i.
Ta asabe allaha ta’alara paksa theke, yini samunnata martabara adhikari.
Pheresatagana ebam ruha allaha ta’alara dike urdhbagami haya emana ekadine, yara parimana pancasa hajara bachara.
Ata'eba, apani uttama sabara karuna.
Tara e'i ayabake suduraparahata mane kare
ara ami eke asanna dekhachi.

bandhu bandhura khabara nibe na.

tara strike, tara bhratake
tara gosthike, yara take asraya dita.
Ebam prthibira sabakichuke, atahpara nijeke raksa karate ca'ibe.
Kakhana'i naya. Niscaya eta lelihana agni.
Ya camara tule dibe.
Se se'i byaktike dakabe ye satyera prati prsthapradarsana karechila o bimukha hayechila.
Sampada punjibhuta karechila, atahpara agaliye rekhechila.
Manusa to srjita hayeche bhirurupe.
Yakhana take anista sparsa kare, takhana se ha-hutasa kare.
Ara yakhana kalyanaprapta haya, takhana krpana haye yaya.
Tabe tara sbatantra, yara namaya adaya kari.

yanchakari o bancitera
ebam yara pratiphala dibasake satya bale bisbasa kare.
Ebam yara tadera palanakartara sastira samparke bhita-kampita.
Niscaya tadera palanakartara sasti theke nihsanka thaka yaya na.
Ebam yara tadera yauna-angake sanyata rakhe
kintu tadera stri athaba malikanabhukta dasidera belaya tiraskrta habe na.
Ata'eba, yara edera chara an'yake kamana kare, tara'i simalanghanakari.
Ebam yara tadera amanata o angikara raksa kare
ebam yara tadera saksyadane sarala-nisthabana
ebam yara tadera namaye yatnabana
tara'i jannate sam'manita habe.
Ata'eba, kapheradera ki hala ye, tara apanara dike urdhbasbase chute asache.
Dana o bamadika theke dale dale.
Tadera pratyeke'i ki asa kare ye, take neyamatera jannate dakhila kara habe
kakhana'i naya, ami taderake emana bastu dbara srsti karechi, ya tara jane.
Ami sapatha karachi udayacala o astacalasamuhera palanakartara, niscaya'i ami saksama
tadera paribarte utkrstatara manusa srsti karate ebam eta amara sadhyera atita naya.
Ata'eba, apani taderake chere dina, tara bakabitanda o krira-kautuka karuka se'i dibasera sam'mukhina ha'oya paryanta, ye dibasera oyada tadera sathe kara hacche.
Se dina tara kabara theke drutabege bera habe, yena tara kona eka laksyasthalera dike chute yacche.
Tadera drsti thakabe abanamita; tara habe hinatagrasta. Eta'i se'idina, yara oyada taderake deya hata.
Ami nuhake prerana karechilama tamra sampradayera prati ekatha baleh tumi tomara sampradayake satarka kara, tadera prati marmantada sasti asara age.
Se balala, he amara sampradaya! Ami tomadera jan'ye spasta satarkakari.
E bisaye ye, tomara allaha ta’alara ebadata kara, tamke bhaya kara ebam amara anugatya kara.
Allaha ta’ala tomadera papasamuha ksama karabena ebam nirdista samaya paryanta abakasa dibena. Niscaya allaha ta’alara nirdistakala yakhana habe, takhana abakasa deya habe na, yadi tomara ta janate
Se balalah he amara palanakarta! Ami amara sampradayake dibaratri da'oyata diyechi
kintu amara da'oyata tadera palayanake'i brd'dhi kareche.

Ami yatabara'i taderake da'oyata diyechi, yate apani taderake ksama karena, tatabara'i tara kane anguli diyeche, mukhamandala bastrabrta kareche, jeda kareche ebam khuba aud'dhatya pradarsana kareche.
Atahpara ami taderake prakasye da'oyata diyechi
atahpara ami ghosana sahakare pracara karechi ebam gopane cupisare balechi.
Atahpara balechih tomara tomadera palanakartara ksama prarthana kara. Tini atyanta ksamasila.
Tini tomadera upara ajasra brstidhara chere dibena
tomadera dhana-sampada o santana-santati bariye dibena, tomadera jan'ye udyana sthapana karabena ebam tomadera jan'ye nadinala prabahita karabena.
Tomadera ki hala ye, tomara allaha ta’alara srestatba asa karacha na.
Athaca tini tomaderake bibhinna rakame srsti karechena.
Tomara ki laksya kara na ye, allaha kibhabe sapta akasa stare stare srsti karechena.
Ebam sekhane candrake rekhechena alorupe ebam suryake rekhechena pradiparupe.
Allaha ta’ala tomaderake mrttika theke udagata karechena.
Atahpara tate phiriye nibena ebam abara punarut'thita karabena.
Allaha ta’ala tomadera jan'ye bhumike karechena bichana.
Yate tomara calaphera kara prasasta pathe.
Nuha balalah he amara palanakarta, amara sampradaya amake aman'ya kareche ara anusarana karache emana lokake, yara dhana-sampada o santana-santati kebala tara ksati'i brd'dhi karache.
Ara tara bhayanaka cakranta karache.
Tara balacheh tomara tomadera upasyaderake tyaga karo na ebam tyaga karo na oyada, suya, iyagucha, iya'uka o nasarake.
Athaca tara anekake pathabhrasta kareche. Ata'eba apani jalemadera pathabhrastata'i bariye dina.
Tadera gonahasamuhera daruna taderake nimajjita kara hayeche, atahpara dakhila kara hayeche jahanname. Atahpara tara allaha ta’ala byatita ka'uke sahayyakari payani.
Nuha ara'o balalah he amara palanakarta, apani prthibite kona kaphera grhabasike reha'i dibena na.
Yadi apani taderake reha'i dena, tabe tara apanara bandaderake pathabhrasta karabe ebam janma dite thakabe kebala papacari, kaphera.

He amara palanakarta! Apani amake, amara pita-matake, yara mumina haye amara grhe prabesa kare-taderake ebam mumina purusa o mumina nariderake ksama karuna ebam yalemadera kebala dhbansa'i brd'dhi karuna.
Balunah amara prati ohi nayila kara hayeche ye, jinadera ekati dala kora'ana srabana kareche, atahpara tara balecheh amara bismayakara kora'ana srabana karechi
ya satpatha pradarsana kare. Phale amara tate bisbasa sthapana karechi. Amara kakhana'o amadera palanakartara sathe ka'uke sarika karaba na.
Ebam ara'o bisbasa kari ye, amadera palanakartara mahana maryada sabara urdhbe. Tini kona patni grahana karenani ebam tamra kona santana ne'i.
Amadera madhye nirbodhera allaha ta’ala samparke barabarira kathabarta balata.
Athaca amara mane karatama, manusa o jina kakhana'o allaha ta’ala samparke mithya balate pare na.
Aneka manusa aneka jinera asraya nita, phale tara jinadera atnambharita bariye dita.
Tara dharana karata, yemana tomara manabera dharana kara ye, mrtyura para allaha ta’ala kakhana'o ka'uke punarut'thita karabena na.
Amara akasa paryabeksana karachi, atahpara dekhate peyechi ye, kathora prahari o ulkapinda dbara akasa paripurna.
Amara akasera bibhinna ghamtite sambada srabanarthe basatama. Ekhana ke'u sambada sunate ca'ile se jalanta ulkapinda omt pete thakate dekhe.
Amara jani na prthibibasidera amangala sadhana kara abhista, na tadera palanakarta tadera mangala sadhana karara iccha rakhena.
Amadera ke'u ke'u satkarmaparayana ebam ke'u ke'u erupa naya. Amara chilama bibhinna pathe bibhakta.
Amara bujhate perechi ye, amara prthibite allaha ta’alake parasta karate paraba na ebam palayana kare'o take aparaka karata paraba na.
Amara yakhana supathera nirdesa sunalama, takhana tate bisbasa sthapana karalama. Ata'eba, ye tara palanakartara prati bisbasa kare, se lokasana o jora-jabarera asanka kare na.
Amadera kichusankhyaka ajnabaha ebam kichusankhyaka an'yayakari. Yara ajnabaha haya, tara satpatha beche niyeche.
Ara yara an'yayakari, tara to jahannamera indhana.
Ara e'i pratyadesa kara hayeche ye, tara yadi satyapathe kayema thakata, tabe ami taderake pracura pani barsane sikta karatama.
Yate e byapare taderake pariksa kari. Paksantare ye byakti tara palanakartara smarana theke mukha phiriye neya, tini take udiyamana ayabe paricalita karabena.
Ebam e'i ohi'o kara hayeche ye, masajidasamuha allaha ta’alake smarana karara jan'ya. Ata'eba, tomara allaha ta’alara sathe ka'uke deko na.
Ara yakhana allaha ta’alara banda tamke dakara jan'ye dandayamana hala, takhana aneka jina tara kache bhira jamala.
Balunah ami to amara palanakartake'i daki ebam tamra sathe ka'uke sarika kari na.
Balunah ami tomadera ksati sadhana karara o supathe anayana karara malika na'i.
Balunah allaha ta’alara kabala theke amake ke'u raksa karate parabe na ebam tini byatita ami kona asrayasthala paba na.
Kintu allaha ta’alara bani pauchano o tamra payagama pracara kara'i amara kaja. Ye allaha o tamra rasulake aman'ya kare, tara jan'ye rayeche jahannamera agni. Tathaya tara cirakala thakabe.
Emanaki yakhana tara pratisruta sasti dekhate pabe, takhana tara janate parabe, kara sahayyakari durbala ebam kara sankhya kama.
Balunah ami jani na tomadera pratisruta bisaya asanna na amara palanakarta era jan'ye kona meyada sthira kare rekhechena.
Tini adrsyera jnani. Paranta tini adrsya bisaya kara'o kache prakasa karena na.
Tamra manonita rasula byatita. Takhana tini tara agre o pascate prahari niyukta karena
yate allaha ta’ala jene nena ye, rasulagana tamdera palanakartara payagama pauchiyechena ki na. Rasulaganera kache ya ache, ta tamra jnana-gocara. Tini sabakichura sankhyara hisaba rakhena.
He bastrabrta
ratrite dandayamana hona kichu ansa bada diye
ardharatri athaba tadapeksa kichu kama
athaba tadapeksa besi ebam kora'ana abrtti karuna subin'yasta bhabe o spastabhabe.
Ami apanara prati abatirna karechi gurutbapurna bani.
Niscaya ebadatera jan'ye ratrite utha prabrtti dalane sahayaka ebam spasta uccaranera anukula.
Niscaya dibabhage rayeche apanara dirgha karmabyastata.
Apani apanara palanakartara nama smarana karuna ebam ekagracitte tate magna hona.
Tini purba o pascimera adhikarta. Tini byatita kona upasya ne'i. Ata'eba, tamke'i grahana karuna karmabidhayakarupe.
Kapherara ya bale, tajjan'ye apani sabara karuna ebam sundarabhabe taderake parihara kare caluna.
Bitta-baibhabera adhikari mithyaropakariderake amara hate chere dina ebam taderake kichu abakasa dina.
Niscaya amara kache ache sikala o agnikunda.
Galagraha haye yaya emana khadya ebam yantranadayaka sasti.
Yedina prthibi parbatamala prakampita habe ebam parbatasamuha haye yabe bahamana balukastupa.
Ami tomadera kache ekajana rasulake tomadera jan'ye saksi kare prerana karechi, yemana prerana karechilama phera'unera kache ekajana rasula.
Atahpara phera'una se'i rasulake aman'ya karala, phale ami take kathina sasti diyechi.
Ata'eba, tomara kirupe atnaraksa karabe yadi tomara sedinake asbikara kara, yedina balakake kare diba brd'dha
sedina akasa bidirna habe. Tara pratisruti abasya'i bastabayita habe.
Eta upadesa. Ata'eba, yara iccha, se tara palanakartara dike patha abalambana karuka.

Apanara palanakarta janena, apani ebadatera jan'ye dandayamana hana ratrira praya du’trtiyansa, ardhansa o trtiyansa ebam apanara sangidera ekati dala'o dandayamana haya. Allaha diba o ratri parimapa karena. Tini janena, tomara era purna hisaba rakhate para na. Ata'eba tini tomadera prati ksama parayana hayechena. Kaje'i kora'anera yatatuku tomadera jan'ye sahaja, tatatuku abrtti kara. Tini janena tomadera madhye ke'u ke'u asustha habe, ke'u ke'u allahara anugraha sandhane dese-bidese yabe ebam ke'u ke'u allahara pathe jehade lipta habe. Kaje'i kora'anera yatatuku tomadera jan'ye sahaja tatatuku abrtti kara. Tomara namaya kayema kara, yakata da'o ebam allahake uttama rna da'o. Tomara nijedera jan'ye ya kichu agre pathabe, ta allahara kache uttama akare ebam puraskara hisebe bardhitarupe pabe. Tomara allahara kache ksamaprarthana kara. Niscaya allaha ksamasila, dayalu.
He cadarabrta
uthuna, satarka karuna
apana palanakartara mahatmya ghosana karuna
apana posaka pabitra karuna
ebam apabitrata theke dure thakuna.
Adhika pratidanera asaya an'yake kichu dibena na.
Ebam apanara palanakartara uddese sabara karuna.
Yedina singaya phumka deya habe
sedina habe kathina dina
kapheradera jan'ye eta sahaja naya.
Yake ami anan'ya kare srsti karechi, take amara hate chere dina.
Ami take bipula dhana-sampada diyechi.
Ebam sada sangi putrabarga diyechi
ebam take khuba sacchalata diyechi.
Erapara'o se asa kare ye, ami take ara'o besi de'i.
Kakhana'i naya! Se amara nidarsanasamuhera birud'dhacaranakari.
Ami sattbara'i take sastira pahare arohana karaba.
Se cinta kareche ebam manahsthira kareche
dhbansa hoka se, kirupe se manahsthira kareche
abara dhbansa hoka se, kirupe se manahsthira kareche
se abara drstipata kareche
atahpara se bhrukuncita kareche o mukha bikrta kareche
atahpara prsthapradasana kareche o ahankara kareche.
Erapara balecheh eto loka parasparaya prapta jadu bai naya
eto manusera ukti bai naya.
Ami take dakhila karaba agnite.
Apani ki bujhalena agni ki
eta aksata rakhabe na ebam charabe'o na.
Manusake dagdha karabe.
Era upara niyojita ache unisa (pheresata).

Ami jahannamera tattbabadhayaka pheresata'i rekhechi. Ami kapheraderake pariksa karara jan'ye'i tara e'i sankhya karechi-yate kitabira drrhabisbasi haya, muminadera imana brd'dhi paya ebam kitabira o muminagana sandeha posana na kare ebam yate yadera antare roga ache, tara ebam kapherara bale ye, allaha era dbara ki bojhate ceyechena. Emanibhabe allaha yake iccha pathabhrasta karena ebam yake iccha satpathe calana. Apanara palanakartara bahini samparke ekamatra tini'i janena eta to manusera jan'ye upadesa bai naya.
Kakhana'i naya. Candrera sapatha
sapatha ratrira yakhana tara abasana haya
sapatha prabhatakalera yakhana ta alokodbhasita haya
niscaya jahannama gurutara bipadasamuhera an'yatama
manusera jan'ye satarkakari.
Tomadera madhye ye samane agrasara haya athaba pascate thake.
Pratyeka byakti tara krtakarmera jan'ya dayi
kintu danadikasthara
tara thakabe jannate ebam paraspare jijnasabada karabe.
Aparadhidera samparke
balabeh tomaderake kise jahanname nita kareche
tara balabeh amara namaya paratama na
abhabagrastake aharyya ditama na
Amara samalocakadera sathe samalocana karatama.
Ebam amara pratiphala dibasake asbikara karatama.
Amadera mrtyu paryanta.
Ata'eba, suparisakaridera suparisa tadera kona upakare asabe na.
Tadera ki hala ye, tara upadesa theke mukha phiriye neya
yena tara itastatah biksipta gardabha.
Hattagolera karane palayanapara.
Baram tadera pratyeke'i caya tadera pratyekake ekati um'mukta grantha deya hoka.
Kakhana'o na, baram tara parakalake bhaya kare na.
Kakhana'o na, eta to upadesa matra.
Ata'eba, yara iccha, se eke smarana karuka.
Tara smarana karabe na, kintu yadi allaha cana. Tini'i bhayera yogya ebam ksamara adhikari.
Ami sapatha kari keyamata dibasera
ara'o sapatha kari se'i manera, ye nijeke dhikkara deya
manusa ki mane kare ye ami tara asthisamuha ekatrita karaba na
paranta ami tara anguligulo paryanta sathikabhabe sannibesita karate saksama.
Baram manusa tara bhabisyata jibane'o dhrstata karate caya
se prasna kare-keyamata dibasa kabe
yakhana drsti camake yabe
candra jyotihina haye yabe.
Ebam surya o candrake ekatrita kara habe
se dina manusa balabeh palayanera jayaga kothaya
na kotha'o asrayasthala ne'i.
Apanara palanakartara kache'i sedina thami habe.
Sedina manusake abahita kara habe se ya samane prerana kareche o pascate chere diyeche.
Baram manusa nije'i tara nijera samparke caksumana.
Yadi'o se tara ajuhata pesa karate ca'ibe.
Taratari sikhe neyara jan'ye apani druta ohi abrtti karabena na.
Era sanraksana o patha amara'i dayitba.
Atahpara ami yakhana ta patha kari, takhana apani se'i pathera anusarana karuna.
Erapara bisada barnana amara'i dayitba.
Kakhana'o na, baram tomara parthiba jibanake bhalabasa
ebam parakalake upeksa kara.
Sedina aneka mukhamandala ujjbala habe.
Tara tara palanakartara dike takiye thakabe.
Ara aneka mukhamandala sedina udasa haye parabe.
Tara dharana karabe ye, tadera sathe komara-bhanga acarana kara habe.
Kakhana'o na, yakhana prana kanthagata habe.
Ebam bala habe, ke jharabe
ebam se mane karabe ye, bidayera ksana ese geche.
Ebam gocha gochara sathe jarita haye yabe.
Sedina, apanara palanakartara nikata sabakichu nita habe.
Se bisbasa kareni ebam namaya pareni
paranta mithyaropa kareche o prstha pradarsana kareche.
Atahpara se dambhabhare paribara-parijanera nikata phire giyeche.
Tomara durbhogera upara durbhoga.
Atahpara, tomara durbhogera upara durbhoga.
Manusa ki mane kare ye, take emani chere deya habe
se ki skhalita birya chila na
atahpara se chila raktapinda, atahpara allaha take srsti karechena ebam subin'yasta karechena.
Atahpara ta theke srsti karechena yugala nara o nari.
Tabu'o ki se'i allaha mrtaderake jibita karate saksama nana
manusera upara emana kichu samaya atibahita hayeche yakhana se ullekhayogya kichu chila na.
Ami manusake srsti karechi misra sukrabindu theke, ebhabe ye, take pariksa karaba atahpara take kare diyechi srabana o drstisaktisampanna.
Ami take patha dekhiye diyechi. Ekhana se haya krtajna haya, na haya akrtajna haya.
Ami abisbasidera jan'ye prastuta rekhechi sikala, beri o prajbalita agni.
Niscaya'i satkarmasilara pana karabe kaphura misrita panapatra.
Eta ekata jharana, ya theke allahara bandagana pana karabe-tara eke prabahita karabe.
Tara mannata purna kare ebam sedinake bhaya kare, yedinera anista habe suduraprasari.
Tara allahara preme abhabagrasta, etima o bandike aharya dana kare.
Tara baleh kebala allahara santustira jan'ye amara tomaderake aharya dana kari ebam tomadera kache kona pratidana o krtajnata kamana kari na.
Amara amadera palanakartara tarapha theke eka bhitiprada bhayankara dinera bhaya rakhi.
Atahpara allaha taderake sedinera anista theke raksa karabena ebam taderake dibena sajibata o ananda.
Ebam tadera sabarera pratidane taderake dibena jannata o resami posaka.
Tara sekhane sinhasane helana diye basabe. Sekhane raudra o saitya anubhaba karabe na.
Tara brksachaya tadera upara jhumke thakabe ebam tara phalasamuha tadera ayattadhina rakha habe.
Taderake paribesana kara habe rupara patre ebam sphatikera mata panapatre.
Rupali sphatika patre, paribesanakarira ta parimapa kare purna karabe.
Taderake sekhane pana karano habe ‘yanajabila’ misrita panapatra.
Eta jannatasthita ‘salasabila’ namaka ekati jharana.
Tadera kache ghoraphera karabe cira kisoragana. Apani taderake dekhe mane karabena yena biksipta mani-mukta.
Apani yakhana sekhane dekhabena, takhana neyamataraji o bisala rajya dekhate pabena.
Tadera abarana habe cikana sabuja resama o mota sabuja resama ebam taderake paridhana karono habe raupya nirmita kankana ebam tadera palanakarta taderake pana karabena ‘sarabana-tahura’.
Eta tomadera pratidana. Tomadera pracesta sbikrti labha kareche.
Ami apanara prati paryayakrame kora'ana nayila karechi.
Ata'eba, apani apanara palanakartara adesera jan'ye dhairyya sahakare apeksa karuna ebam odera madhyakara kona papistha kapherera anugatya karabena na.
Ebam sakala-sandhyaya apana palanakartara nama smarana karuna.
Ratrira kichu anse tamra uddese sijada karuna ebam ratrira dirgha samaya tamra pabitrata barnana karuna.
Niscaya era parthiba jibanake bhalabase ebam eka kathina dibasake pascate phele rakhe.
Ami taderake srsti karechi ebam majabuta karechi tadera gathana. Ami yakhana iccha karaba, takhana tadera paribarte tadera anurupa loka anaba.
Eta upadesa, ata'eba yara iccha haya se tara palanakartara patha abalambana karuka.
Allahara abhipraya byatireke tomara an'ya kona abhipraya posana karabe na. Allaha sarbajna prajnamaya.
Tini yake iccha tamra rahamate dakhila karena. Ara yalemadera jan'ye to prastuta rekhechena marmantuda sasti.
Kalyanera jan'ye prerita bayura sapatha
sajore prabahita jhatikara sapatha
meghabistrtakari bayura sapatha
meghapunja bitaranakari bayura sapatha ebam
ohi niye abataranakari pheresataganera sapatha
oyara-apattira abakasa na rakhara jan'ye athaba satarka karara jan'ye.
Niscaya'i tomaderake pradatta oyada bastabayita habe.
Atahpara yakhana naksatrasamuha nirbapita habe
yakhana akasa chidrayukta habe
yakhana parbatamalake uriye deya habe ebam
yakhana rasulaganera ekatrita ha'oyara samaya nirupita habe
esaba bisaya kona dibasera jan'ye sthagita rakha hayeche
bicara dibasera jan'ya.
Apani janena bicara dibasa ki
sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Ami ki purbabartiderake dhbansa karini
atahpara tadera pascate prerana karaba parabartiderake.
Aparadhidera sathe ami erupa'i kare thaki.
Sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Ami ki tomaderake tuccha pani theke srsti karini
atahpara ami ta rekhechi eka sanraksita adhare
eka nirdistakala paryanta
atahpara ami parimita akare srsti karechi, ami kata saksama srasta
sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Ami ki prthibike srsti karini dharanakarinirupe
jibita o mrtaderake
ami tate sthapana karechi majabuta su'ucca parbatamala ebam pana kariyechi tomaderake trsna nibaranakari supeya pani.
Sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Cala tomara tara'i dike, yake tomara mithya balate.
Cala tomara tina kundalibisista chayara dike
ye chaya sunibira naya ebam agnira uttapa theke raksa kare na.
Eta attalika sadrsa brhat sphulinga niksepa karabe.
Yena se pitabarna ustrasreni.
Sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Eta emana dina, yedina ke'u katha balabe na.
Ebam ka'uke ta'oba karara anumati deya habe na.
Sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Eta bicara dibasa, ami tomaderake ebam tomadera purbabartiderake ekatrita karechi.
Ata'eba, tomadera kona apakausala thakale ta prayoga kara amara kache.
Sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Niscaya khodabhirura thakabe chayaya ebam prasrabanasamuhe
ebam tadera banchita phala-mulera madhye.
Bala habeh tomara ya karate tara binimaye trptira sathe panahara kara.
Ebhabe'i ami satkarmasiladerake puraskrta kare thaki.
Sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Kapheragana, tomara kichudina kheye na'o ebam bhoga kare na'o. Tomara to aparadhi.
Sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Yakhana taderake bala haya, nata ha'o, takhana tara nata haya na.
Sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe.
Ekhana kona kathaya tara erapara bisbasa sthapana karabe
